Refer to the image below.

“The Making of Needles,” from the Encyclopedia, or a Systematic Dictionary of the Sciences, Arts, and Crafts, published in France between 1751 and 1772

Universal History Archive/UIG / Bridgeman Images

Caption states: “Needles: Cutting from steel wire (ﬁg. 1), ﬂattening end (ﬁg. 4), stamping eye (ﬁg. 2), punching eye (ﬁg. 3), ﬁling eye and pointing end (ﬁg. 7), polishing (ﬁg. 8). Speciﬁc monotonous task. Process virtually unchanged for 200 years.”
content.question: Which of the following would most directly transform the production method depicted in the image?

choices.label: The abolition of traditional guild restrictions
The implementation of laissez-faire trade policies
The development of mercantilist economic theories
